definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: Conclusion Heavy-moxibustion is a good method for constipation after stroke.
sentences.chinese: 结论重灸法是治疗中风后便秘的良好方法。

sentences.english: He had constipation for few days but still had flatus passage todays.
sentences.chinese: 他有少许日子是便秘的，但是今天仍然有排气。

sentences.english: This article presents professor Cai Gan's experience in the treatment of senile habitual constipation.
sentences.chinese: 介绍蔡淦教授治疗老年习惯性便秘的经验。

sentences.english: It’ll flush your system and reduce headaches and constipation.
sentences.chinese: 这样会振奋你的身体系统并减少头痛和便秘。

sentences.english: This paper introduces professor Cai Gan's clinical experience in the differentiation and treatment of functional constipation.
sentences.chinese: 介绍蔡淦教授治疗功能性便秘的经验。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE:To investigate the defection dynamics of Yiqi Runchang Liquid in treating asthenic-type constipation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨益气润肠液对虚证便秘肛肠动力的作用。

sentences.english: When a constipation suggestion retired old person goes to the bathroom, faints suddenly in the place.
sentences.chinese: 便秘诱发型一离休老人如厕时，突然晕倒在地。

sentences.english: Objective To comprehend the diagnostic value of defecography to the functional outlet obstruction constipation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨排粪造影对功能性出口便秘的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Enema for constipation in children and the treatment of the elderly and infirm.
sentences.chinese: 开塞露用于小儿及年老体弱者便秘的治疗。

sentences.english: The incidences of constipation were analyzed statistically.
sentences.chinese: 统计术后便秘的发生率。

sentences.english: Though I keep telling older people that the bidet helps with constipation.
sentences.chinese: 即使我不断的告诉老人们这个做浴盆对便秘有好处。

sentences.english: The doctor told Charles to drink a large glass of prune juice every day to help his constipation.
sentences.chinese: 医生告诉查尔斯每天喝一大杯酸梅汁能改善便秘。

sentences.english: Wheatgrass is great for constipation and keeping the bowels open.
sentences.chinese: 麦草对便秘和保持肠道活力有奇效。

sentences.english: This kind of food is constipating.
sentences.chinese: 这类食物会引起便秘的。

sentences.english: Study on health eduction route to prevent coprostasis for bedridden patients in orthopaedics.
sentences.chinese: 健康教育路径对预防骨科卧床病人便秘的临床研究。

sentences.english: Supplement the calcium with 500 mg of magnesium to avoid constipation.
sentences.chinese: 补钙的同时摄入500毫克镁能够防止便秘。

definition: (of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)
